attributes.action: Condemn or sanction the french government over neo-colonial CFA monetary system.
attributes.additional_details:
For the full story, watch this documentary- https://youtu.be/42_-ALNwpUo 
by independent Journalist Caspian Report on YouTube.
attributes.background: Former french president Jacques Chirac said “A big part of the money in our banks comes from the exploitation of the Africa” this is a neat way to sum up the effect of France’s CFA. Through violence, France has maintained a system whereby french firms profit at the expensive of impoverished nations.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Countries that use the CFA are able to leave the currency system.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
